data.name: RPGScenery - Fortress Gate Scene
data.detailed_description:
The fortress stands on a barren hill surrounded by dead trees. Its not a thing of beauty, but it was not built for that reason. The bastions and massive stone walls carry the traces of countless sieges. Between the barren trees, a single muddy road leads to the gate of the fort. The area, like the old building, is tired, worn-out under the weight of the years. Who and why is protecting this gloomy place?

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
